title: #1542 You Have A Scotch, I'll Have A Joint
itunes:title: #1542 You Have A Scotch, I'll Have A Joint
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing a local Pasadena phenomenon known as 'The Doo Dah Parade' and use that as a jumping off point to discuss counter culture. They also discuss the misguided nutritional thoughts of Adam's mom and many others in the 1970s. They also speak with a caller who recently got very sick and wants Drew's thoughts on the reason behind it. As the show wraps up the guys discuss the situation in Ukraine and their frustration with the fact that you can no longer find any news outlets that are trustworthy. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:

Geico.com
